explains: n. 欣赏，鉴赏；感激，感谢；理解，领会；升值，增值；（赞赏性的）演讲，文字
wordGroup: appreciation of the rmb 人民币升值
stock appreciation 股票升值，存货升值；库存增值

sentences.en: You have to take capital appreciation of the property into account.
sentences.cn: 你得将那个房产的资本增值考虑进来。

sentences.en: The aim is to inculcate businesspeople with an appreciation of different cultures.
sentences.cn: 其目的是教导商界人员学会欣赏不同的文化。

sentences.en: She shows little appreciation of good music.
sentences.cn: 她感受不到美好音乐的妙处。
